decks.notes: This Dimir Control deck focuses on using a combination of counter spells, removal, and card draw to control the game and outvalue the opponent. Utilizing cards like Counterspell, Snuff Out, and Gurmag Angler, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while gaining card advantage through spells like Brainstorm and Deep Analysis. With a mix of efficient removal options and ways to dig through the deck for key cards, this deck looks to establish control of the game and grind out a victory through attrition.

This deck focuses on assembling a combination of cards that enables the player to quickly accumulate poison counters on their opponent, ultimately leading to victory. The deck includes cards that allow for card draw, mana acceleration, and protection, while also maximizing the ability to generate poison counters. By efficiently cycling through the deck and utilizing various combo pieces, the player aims to overwhelm their opponent with poison counters before they can mount a significant defense. The deck's strategy revolves around quickly building up poison counters to secure a win in a fast-paced Pauper 1 vs 1 game.

The deck utilizes a combination of control spells and gate creatures to protect and strengthen its board presence. Counterspells and removal provide disruption, while cards like Guardian of the Guildpact and The Modern Age serve as powerful threats. Prismatic Strands offers protection, while Squadron Hawk and Sacred Cat provide recurring creatures. The Gates provide mana fixing and synergy with cards like Journey to Nowhere. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through a mix of removal, protection, and efficient threats.

The deck focuses on using walls to generate mana and protect the player until they can assemble their combo pieces to go off. By utilizing cards like Shield-Wall Sentinel, Overgrown Battlement, and Axebane Guardian to create mana, along with tools like Winding Way and Lead the Stampede to dig for combo pieces, the player can quickly set up the win condition. The key combo involves cards like Freed from the Real and Galvanic Alchemist to generate infinite mana and potentially win the game with Valakut Invoker or another win condition.
